# createFolder

create a public/private folder

## Usage

```js
import { FolderType } from "@dataverse/dataverse-connector";

await dataverseConnector.createFolder({
  folderType: FolderType.Private,
  folderName,
});
```

## Parameters
```js
{
    folderType: FolderType;
    folderName: string;
    folderDescription?: string;
}
```
- `folderType`: `FolderType` - folder type
    ```js
    enum FolderType {
        Public,
        Private,
        Datatoken
    }
    ```
- `folderName`: `string` - folder name
- OPTIONAL - `folderDescription`: `string` - folder description

## Returns
```js
{
  newFolder: StructuredFolder;
  allFolders: StructuredFolders;
}
```
Example:
```json
{
  "newFolder": {
    "options": {
      "folderName": "test",
      "folderDescription": "",
      "encryptedSymmetricKey": "",
      "decryptionConditions": "_",
      "encrypted": "n41WwrV_tJLXzj0StNvMD2ZJ2EgYJJr9_NbzU0BNvy-08Xlg6qUe7u_yBwljdTXxHSCnewkkOyQJZYlL9GDweZ0S4xt055tQhWv9fShSblg"
    },
    "model": [
      "kjzl6hvfrbw6c9k4u7fjs3guaasf2rt7s7hdo263xo84irab7pne5mfjwsxqc8z",
      "kjzl6hvfrbw6ca4r7cdi7adbmlu4dtuau3wqtndzx9owppolxik7hxk8fwcs4jx"
    ],
    "folderType": 1,
    "createdAt": "2023-06-02T09:41:37.796Z",
    "updatedAt": "2023-06-02T09:41:37.796Z",
    "folderId": "kjzl6kcym7w8y6zr9u0o0lf9sm886v2l1wvljsfyjlx6n1zejcruz7id403gx2p",
    "contentFolderIds": [
      "kjzl6kcym7w8y7r6w4k08iawoay1vxvsf4plgs6f0210v1c83ohnb9kirrs5rn6"
    ],
    "mirrors": {},
    "mirrorsLocked": false
  },
  "allFolders": {
    ...
  }
}
```
